title: Lush Garden Apartment Hard Ground floor Pet Friendly by Park & Shops
posting_body: ['Hopkins Park is a unique, garden-style apartment community conveniently located within walking distance to North Berkeley Bart Station, AC Transit, shops, cafes, and a wide assortment of restaurants and grocery stores.', 'The lush, landscaped grounds and charming neighborhood make this a perfect place for anyone looking for a tranquil retreat a stones throw away from the bustle of University Ave.', 'Our daily soundtrack consists of birds and windchimes.', "Yet, we're just minutes away from Acme Bread, Whole Foods, Tokyo Fish Market, Sprouts, Berkeley Natural Grocery, and Monterey Market.", 'We are parallel to the Ohlone Greenway, a smooth paved commuting and recreational corridor through Berkeley to Richmond.', 'We are nestled between Public Tennis Courts, Cedar-Rose Park and Peralta Community Garden.', 'Find vaulted ceilings on the second floor or hard luxury vinyl flooring on the first floor.', 'Either way, you’ll find yourself at home here.', 'We are \u2028\u2028High-Speed Fiber Optic Internet Ready', '(Sonic is around $30 a month).', 'No more worrying about street cleaning tickets, it comes with one off street parking stall.', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Availability: 1st and 2nd Floors', 'Floors in Bldg: 2', 'Parking Spaces: 1', 'Pets Allowed: Cats and Dogs (2 only)', 'Travel Time:', 'TO North Berkeley BART', 'Walking: 9 min', 'Bike: 3 min', 'TO UC Berkeley', 'Walking: 37 minutes', 'Bike: 12 min', 'MOVE IN COSTS', "First Month's Rent....$2,395", 'Security Deposit......$600 on approved credit.', "Pet Deposit............$500\u2028\u2028\u2028 Pets are welcome, at the owner's discretion, with a refundable Pet Deposit ($500.00).", 'Please ask about our Pet Policy.', '\u2028 NO PET RENT.', 'We accept Co-signers.', 'Call, email, or text for more information!', 'INCLUDED', 'Water, Trash, Recycling Compost', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Microwave', 'Wall to Wall Luxury Vinyl Flooring on 1st floor', 'AMENITIES', 'High-Speed Internet (Fiber Optic )', 'On-site, card-operated laundry facilities (no coins!)', "Free Additional Storage (3' x 3' x 3)", 'Friendly Full Time Maintenance Staff', 'Microwave', 'Tennis courts', 'This property complies with the Fair Chance Access to Housing Ordinance, which is a Berkeley law that prohibits rental discrimination based on criminal history.', '\u2028\u2028Thank you for your interest in Hopkins Park Apartments!', 'OPEN HOUSE:', 'Tuesdays and Thursdays 5pm-7pm (Drop in ok)', 'OR', 'Schedule a tour here: <URL>']
